title: Google Agentspace is bringing AI agents and AI-powered search to enterprises.
description: Google Cloud is introducing Google Agentspace to help companies make their employees even more productive. Agentspace includes agents that bring together Gemini’s advanc…
excerpt: Google Cloud is introducing Google Agentspace to help companies make their employees even more productive. Agentspace includes agents that bring together Gemini’s advanc…
text: Google Cloud is introducing Google Agentspace to help companies make their employees even more productive. Agentspace includes agents that bring together Gemini’s advanced reasoning, Google-quality search and enterprise data, regardless of where it’s hosted. Here’s what you need to know:NotebookLM Plus is available as a out-of-the-box agent in Agentspace, offering employees the helpful features of NotebookLM — uploading information to synthesize, uncovering insights and enjoying new ways of engaging with data, such as podcast-like audio summaries — and enhancing it with security and privacy features for work.Google Agentspace provides a single, company-branded multimodal search agent that acts as a central source of enterprise truth for the entire organization with the ability to answer complex questions, make proactive suggestions and take actions based on your company’s unique information.It also provides a single space for all custom expert AI agents used within a company to help employees do things like conduct better research, draft content quickly and automate repetitive tasks.Check out the Google Cloud blog for more information.
html:
Google Cloud is introducing Google Agentspace to help companies make their employees even more productive. Agentspace includes agents that bring together Gemini’s advanced reasoning, Google-quality search and enterprise data, regardless of where it’s hosted. Here’s what you need to know:

  • NotebookLM Plus is available as a out-of-the-box agent in Agentspace, offering employees the helpful features of NotebookLM — uploading information to synthesize, uncovering insights and enjoying new ways of engaging with data, such as podcast-like audio summaries — and enhancing it with security and privacy features for work.
  • Google Agentspace provides a single, company-branded multimodal search agent that acts as a central source of enterprise truth for the entire organization with the ability to answer complex questions, make proactive suggestions and take actions based on your company’s unique information.
  • It also provides a single space for all custom expert AI agents used within a company to help employees do things like conduct better research, draft content quickly and automate repetitive tasks.

Check out the Google Cloud blog for more information.
